channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: As AI data centers hit power limits, Peak XV backs Indian startup C2i to fix the bottleneck
item.description: C2i has raised $15 million as it tests a grid-to-GPU approach to reducing power losses in AI data centers.

item.title: I tested the Miofive Mirror 1 for a month – it’s the 4K dash cam could replace your rearview mirror (if it fits)
item.description: The Miofive Mirror 1 Dash cam comes packed with features and functions while offering much more versatility than standard rear-view glass
